description:
Linlin enrages the Giants as she slays their respected warrior - but Mother throws herself on their mercy and begs for clemency for her beloved Linlin, forcing the troupe to leave Elbaph for good. But the kindness Mother shows belies a dark and twisted secret...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Geburtsstunde von Big Mom! – Der Tag an dem Mutter Carmel verschwand!
L`anniversaire de Mama. Le jour où Caramel a disparu
Mom Tanjou: Carmel ga Kieta Hi
The Birth of Mom! The Day That Carmel Vanished!
День рождения Мамочки! День когда пропала Карамель!
マム誕生 カルメルが消えた日
